name: claude-env
description: Sync ~/.claude/ config across environments via Git + SOPS

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "if(!require('fs').existsSync(require('path').join(__dirname,'dist','index.js'))){console.error('
  claude-env: dist/index.js is missing (known Windows npm issue).
  Fix: git clone https://github.com/on6qd/claude-env.git && npm install -g ./claude-env
');process.exit(1)}"
